title: Question with Honor gain and promotion
body:
I am curious if perhaps there is some sort of bug with my account and the Honor system. Currently I am** still **sitting at Rank 2. However, I feel like comparably to my friends and others I've spoken with, I should have moved up by now. I have played over 150 games, I frequently am honored by teammates, I've never been punished. It feels like something is wrong where I am not getting credit for my honors.

Unfortunately there is no transparency with this system for me to verify that there is in fact something wrong. Is there any possible way for me to verify there is no bug?

replies.body: There is no bug with Honor, but it can take some time.  It may actually slow down, though, if there is some dishonorable behavior.  Checking this out for you I do see some occurrences of this, but you'll want to hit up our Player Behavior team directly through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like more context on this!
Shouldn't I be notified when I have dishonorable behavior?

Not in this case because it's not enough to be penalized by the[ Instant Feedback System](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-), but it does raise some flags.  If an actual behavioral occurrence resulted in a penalty then your honor level would drop to 0.

I see. Can you say whether there has been any discussion about making the honor system more transparent? If I knew that I was being penalized for poor sportsmanship then that would give me more cause to reform my behavior. Just a thought...

I hear you, and it's a good point.  I'm not part of the client team though, so I can't make that call.  They're open to feedback and suggestions though, if you'd like to let your voice be heard over at the[ client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).
Thanks, will do. Thanks for looking into for me also, gives me some insight to why I'm not advancing. Looks like I will have to do a better job of keeping my mouth shut :D
